TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlDsigC14NWithCommentsTransform extends System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigC14NTransform

summary.span: 表示數位簽章的 C14N XML 規範化轉換 (連帶註解)，如全球資訊網協會 (W3C) 所定義。

span.span: Represents the C14N XML canonicalization transform for a digital signature as defined by the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C), with comments.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別代表描述 XML 文件的標準格式 C14N XML 規範化轉換。The class represents the C14N XML canonicalization transform that describes the canonical form of an XML document. 此轉換允許來建立使用 XML 文件的標準格式摘要簽署。This transform allows a signer to create a digest using the canonical form of an XML document. 收件者接著可確認數位簽章和相同的轉換使用相同的標準格式的 XML 文件。A recipient can then verify the digital signature using the same canonical form of the XML document with the same transform. 使用類別時，您需要登入包含註解的 XML 文件。Use the class when you need to sign an XML document that contains comments. 請注意，您無法直接建立規範化轉換類別的新執行個體。Note that you cannot directly create a new instance of a canonicalization transform class. 若要指定規範化轉換，將說明要轉換的統一資源識別元 (URI)屬性，這是從存取屬性。To specify a canonicalization transform, pass the Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) that describes the transform to the property, which is accessible from the property. 若要取得規範化轉換的參考，請使用屬性，這是從存取屬性。To acquire a reference to the canonicalization transform, use the property, which is accessible from the property. 描述 URI類別由定義欄位。The URI that describes the class is defined by the field. 描述 URI類別由定義欄位和欄位。The URI that describes the class is defined by the field and the field. 如需有關使用註解 C14N 轉換，請參閱章節 6.5 和 6.6.1 XMLDSIG 規格中，可從在 www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/ World Wide Web Consortium (W3C)。For more information about the C14N with comments transform, see Sections 6.5 and 6.6.1 of the XMLDSIG specification, which is available from the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) at www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/. 標準化演算法被定義在 W3C 標準 XML 規格中，將會位於 www.w3.org/TR/xml-c14n。The canonicalization algorithm is defined in the W3C Canonical XML specification, which is available at www.w3.org/TR/xml-c14n. ## Examples 本節包含兩個程式碼範例。This section contains two code examples. 第一個範例示範如何簽署 XML 檔案使用卸離的簽章。The first example demonstrates how to sign an XML file using a detached signature. 本範例 XML 檔案中建立的 www.microsoft.com 簽章，然後確認該檔案。This example creates a signature of www.microsoft.com in an XML file and then verifies the file. 第二個範例示範如何簽署 XML 檔案使用信封簽章。The second example demonstrates how to sign an XML file using an envelope signature. 此範例中建立 XML 檔案的簽章，並在新的 XML 檔案中儲存簽章。This example creates a signature of an XML file and then saves the signature in new XML file. **範例 #1****Example #1** [!code-cpp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML.XmlDsigC14NWithCommentsTransform_Detached#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML.XmlDsigC14NWithCommentsTransform_Detached/CPP/sampledetached.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML.XmlDsigC14NWithCommentsTransform_Detached#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML.XmlDsigC14NWithCommentsTransform_Detached/CS/sampledetached.cs#1)] summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Examples 本節包含兩個程式碼範例。This section contains two code examples. 第一個範例示範如何簽署 XML 檔案使用卸離的簽章。The first example demonstrates how to sign an XML file using a detached signature. 本範例 XML 檔案中建立的 www.microsoft.com 簽章，然後確認該檔案。This example creates a signature of www.microsoft.com in an XML file and then verifies the file. 第二個範例示範如何簽署 XML 檔案使用信封簽章。The second example demonstrates how to sign an XML file using an envelope signature. 此範例中建立 XML 檔案的簽章，並在新的 XML 檔案中儲存簽章。This example creates a signature of an XML file and then saves the signature in new XML file. **範例 #1****Example #1**
